style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1.033;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" id="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-7" value="http://localhost:8983/solr/" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-4"> <mxGeometry x="0.0125" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-2" value="<b>Solr</b>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="270" width="150" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-3" value="Lucene" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="380" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-5" value="UI" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="365" y="160" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="iB7y5Q2vkx7GoRKBtxKA-6" value="Tika" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" y="380" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
